entry.title: Photos Post 9: Early Photographs (before 1976), Part 06
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 1 new Photo of the event 1973-1200 Passport Photos has been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 1 medium resolution from the Named Collections. This is different from the multiple versions of a Photo from the same event, including three priorly uploaded, that have been shared over the years.
One direct link to all 4 Photos: Chronology 1973.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam

entry.title: Photos Post 9: Early Photographs (before 1976), Part 04
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 8 Photos from the 1972-0409 Public Program, Dhule, Maharashtra, India, the first Public Program with an audio tape, have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 4 high resolutions from the Named Collections and 4 low resolutions received from internet or unknown sources. Other Photos from internet sources with an imprinted caption "&copy Sahaja yoga memories" have been regarded as 'highly edited' and as such they have not been uploaded. If you know anyone involved in 'Sahaja yoga memories', please kindly put us in touch, as our subteam would be most happy to start a proper collection of unedited Photos in a Sahaja Yoga Memories Collection.
One direct link to all 8 Photos: Chronology 1972.
Please kindly share the link and our email sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam

Other Photos from internet sources with an imprinted caption "&copy Sahaja yoga memories" have been regarded as 'highly edited' and as such they have not been uploaded. entry.title: Photos Post 10: Moments of Growth
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to bring to your attention the oldest website of Photographs Jai Shri Mataji or Sahaja Image Events which is managed since the end of 2021 by the Photo Subteam. We have just taken the small Step 4 of the database: the sharing of all photos Moments of Growth and of other related photos. To begin with about 230 photos uploaded yesterday and today we have just created 3 new folders with 12 galleries in total and we hope many-many more will follow out of the thousands and thousands of such photos currently in the CCT database. The Step 4 is part of the yearly long offering at the Lotus Feet of our Divine Mother and of the sharing celebrating the 100 years Birthday Anniversary and expressing our eternal gratitude and love to Her.
You are all invited to either start dedicated new galleries or to contribute to the existing galleries on this website.
Please kindly share the news and the links to the three folders with all our brothers and sisters.
Links:
Moments of Growth
Personalities
Places Visited by Shri Mataji
We thank you in advance for your understanding, contributions, help, support, and feedback. Please write to us at sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Comprehensive Compilations Team
